content.question: In the passage, hos agros olim gens Inda colebat is translated

choices.label: these lands once fed an Indian nation
an Indian nation once cared for these lands
the lands will one day feed this Indian nation
this Indian nation will one day care for the lands

content.answer: an Indian nation once cared for these lands

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
